channel.title: So it begins
channel.description:
Whats so hard about keeping a link in the footer of a free template. xD
[img]http://gyazo.com/9561d0d80d0c814b5d4c6f556e018d74.png?1366137798[/img]
This thread basically serves the purpose of me thanking everyone that has used my templates, but pleaseeeeeee, keep the link in the footer.

item.title: So it begins
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I find it equally hilarious that you release a template for free but expect people to deal with a shitty advertisement on the bottom of the page. I understand completely that the concept of the advertisement is to bring people to you but when was the last time you visited a commercial website and said “Wow! the design of this website is great thank god it has a template advertisement at the bottom of the page”

Because those are commercial designers, or people who are paid to make such designs. This is pretty common, and if people don’t like it, then they can make their own designs.

Read full topic

item.title: So it begins
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I find it equally hilarious that you release a template for free but expect people to deal with a shitty advertisement on the bottom of the page. I understand completely that the concept of the advertisement is to bring people to you but when was the last time you visited a commercial website and said “Wow! the design of this website is great thank god it has a template advertisement at the bottom of the page”

It’s proper credits for me making the template, when you do a report in school and take information from a book you have to include credits and source from where you go the information or you will be considered a plagiarizer. The same concept remains for website templates.

Anyways, another one taken down.

60d4cef08be8a4d5717fbf0fae9d79cf.png?1366402130868×315

Read full topic

item.title: So it begins
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Wenis Tree:

would laugh if the kept the link, just colored the words to the same color as the background, so you couldn’t see it, but technically its still there

Yes, not providing/hiding the only thing in return I ask for templates of such quality is hilarious. Note my sarcasm, it’s ignorant, selfish, and plain dishonest. When a person does that they are essentially stealing from me which I don’t take lightly. Thus why I will be issuing copyright claims with fury.

Read full topic
